solution_line_template: First find the number of ounces Erin serves per minute: {ounces_per_bowl} ounces/bowl * {bowls_per_minute} bowls/minute = <<{ounces_per_bowl}*{bowls_per_minute}={ounces_per_minute}>>{ounces_per_minute} ounces/minute
Then find the number of ounces in the pot: {gallons_in_pot} gallons * {ounces_per_gallon} ounces/gallon = <<{gallons_in_pot}*{ounces_per_gallon}={total_ounces}>>{total_ounces} ounces

Then divide the total amount of soup by the amount of soup Erin serves per minute: {total_ounces} minutes / {ounces_per_minute} ounces/minute = <<{total_ounces}/{ounces_per_minute}={minutes_exact}>>{minutes_exact} minutes, which rounds down to 15 minutes
